emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Smart Contracts
emerging_technologies.description: Contracts that can autonomously adapt to changes in conditions or law, using AI to interpret and enforce terms.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduction in legal disputes, increased automation in contract management, potential for misuse in manipulating contract terms.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires trust in AI and blockchain security, regulatory approval, and integration into existing systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Space Operations
emerging_technologies.description: A network of autonomous spacecraft managed through a blockchain system for coordinated space activities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could democratize space access, new economic opportunities, potential for space-based conflicts.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost, international cooperation, technological maturity of space travel, legal frameworks for space.

emerging_technologies.name: Tokenized Cognitive Enhancements
emerging_technologies.description: Neuro-enhancements where cognitive boosts are tokenized, allowing for a marketplace of cognitive abilities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for cognitive inequality, ethical issues around enhancement, privacy concerns.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ethical acceptance, regulatory approval, public perception of cognitive enhancements.

mainstream_technologies.name: Decentralized Energy Grids
mainstream_technologies.description: Energy distribution networks managed by blockchain for efficient, transparent, and decentralized energy sharing.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Highly adopted in regions with high renewable energy penetration, supported by government policies.

mainstream_technologies.name: Cross-Chain Innovations
mainstream_technologies.description: Technologies allowing seamless interaction between different blockchain ecosystems for enhanced functionality.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread adoption in finance, logistics, and data management sectors.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards systems that operate without centralized control, leveraging blockchain for transparency and security.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes democracy in technology, reduces reliance on central authorities, but requires new governance models.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased push for individual sovereignty, regulatory challenges, growth in cooperative models.

epoch_themes.description: Advancements in technologies that enhance or interface with human cognition through neural interfaces and tokenization.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Could lead to a new class divide based on cognitive capabilities, ethical debates on human enhancement.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on brain research, ethical considerations in tech development, rise in personal data markets.
